title: Short-Intensive Course for Strengthening Clinical Psychology Expert Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational psychology theories and basic understanding of clinical settings
context.additional_context: Optimized content delivery for mobile learning via smartphones, with real-time case analysis and decision-making training through VR simulations

learning_goals: Analyze diverse clinical cases in a VR simulation environment and develop intervention strategies.

Within one week, learners can analyze three CBT-based scenarios using online platforms (e.g., Zoom role-play functionality), perform at least two role-plays with peer evaluators, and provide feedback meeting at least four of five predefined evaluation checklist criteria

After completing the one-week short course, learners can apply acquired knowledge to develop five-step nursing intervention plans for each of three clinical cases (hypertension, diabetes, infection control) in a comprehensive assessment and achieve 'excellent' ratings in at least four of five rubric criteria (accuracy, appropriateness, safety, evidence-based practice, practicality)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
